title: set-password-warning
description: Input schema of the set-password-warning action

notification.description: Enable or disable user domain notifications

days.description: The number of days before the expiration date to send the notification

mail_template_content.description: The template content in base64 format, it can be a text file or an HTML file. It must respect python string.Template syntax. Required if mail_template_name is 'custom'

mail_subject.description: The email subject. It must respect python string.Template syntax. Required if mail_template_name is 'custom'
